title: Cooking at the Academy
creator_credit: Bruce Franchini and KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.)
brief_description: Go behind the scenes of the renowned California Culinary Academy in San Francisco for a taste of a professional cooking school and emerge thinking like a chef! This series gives both novice and experienced cooks an understanding of the how and why of classical cooking techniques.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Franchini and KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.)
description: Go behind the scenes of the renowned California Culinary Academy in San Francisco for a taste of a professional cooking school and emerge thinking like a chef! This series gives both novice and experienced cooks an understanding of the how and why of classical cooking techniques.

This series gives both novice and experienced cooks an understanding of the how and why of classical cooking techniques.
